name: N. Seymour-Smith
body:
## About me:

Hi! I'm a freelance technologist, designing electronic devices that incorporate multi- input and output sensing and feedback for interactive experiences. 

I have extensive experience designing electronic hardware and programming PC interfaces for sensor, monitor and control devices, and creating stand-alone automated modules using microcontroller processing with a range of chips (PIC, dsPIC, ATmega, Arduino).

I'm a former quantum-technologies researcher with seven years experience building precision experiments and technologies for academic research.

## Previous work:
### Photobot custom automated photobooths

### An integrated fiber trap for single-ion photonics

### All-optical broadband excitation of the motional state of trapped ions

### Fast scanning cavity offset lock for laser frequency drift stabilization
